sg.yeefan.searchenginewrapper.clients
Class DuckDuckGoClient

java.lang.Object
  sg.yeefan.searchenginewrapper.clients.DuckDuckGoClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
SearchEngineClient
public class DuckDuckGoClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements SearchEngineClient

A search engine client for DuckDuckGo Search.

Additional comments on using DuckDuckGo Search:

  • The start index in the query is ignored.
Implementation notes: DuckDuckGo Search can return different kinds of results across multiple fields. This client will extract results, where available, from the following fields in the stated order: Abstract, Definition, Results, RelatedTopic.

Author:
Tan Yee Fan

                               throws SearchEngineException
Makes a query to the search engine and returns its results.

Specified by:
getResults in interface SearchEngineClient
Parameters:
query - The search engine query.
Throws:

SearchEngineException - If any other error occurred during the querying.
